law.catch_line: While a licensee is performing a farm labor contracting service in the State, the licensee shall:...
law.text:
While a licensee is performing a farm labor contracting service in the State, the licensee shall:
carry the license; and
show the license:
to each person with whom the licensee intends to deal as a farm labor contractor; and
on request, to an authorized employee or official of the State.
